name: The Caligula Effect: Overdose - Digital Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The Caligula Effect: Overdose - Digital Soundtrack includes 13 tracks + 6 bonus tracks!

1 Peter Pan Syndrome by Kagi-P (40ｍP)
2 Tokimeki*Riberie by Sweet-P (OSTER project)
3 Dokusousei Incident by Shonen-doll (PolyphonicBranch)
4 Sadistic Queen by Mirei (cyoucyo-P)
5 Tenshi No Uta by Ike-P (Asa)

6 sin by Shadow Knife (164)
7 Cosmo Dancer by Wicked (YM)
8 Distorted † Happiness by Thorn (cosMo@Bousou-P)
9 Orbit by Mikito-P
10 Love Scope by Stork (DECO*27)

11 Onboro by Kuchinashi (Pinocchio-P)
12 Suicide Prototype by Lucid (Utsu-P)
13 Veritas by Mikito-P


Bonus tracks

1 Tokimeki*Riberie (TRMX)
2 Dokusousei Incident (TRMX)
3 Tenshi no uta (TRMX)
4 Cosmo×Queen (TRMX)
5 Love Scope (TRMX)
6 Onboro (TRMX)

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains some sexual material in the dialogue: “[T]hey think with their d*cks and not their heads...”; “...[Y]ou’re always staring at their boobs”; “I've encountered molesters and peeping Toms everywhere"; “And what do you think happens when you try to watch sexual stuff behind your mom’s back?”

Ultimately, mature content revolves around strong language that conveys both sexual and violent thematic elements.
